While they often act out to relieve one another's pain, their game might be a way to avoid the fact that they are truly meant for one another.

That evening, Mireille, a girl from provincial France who has come up to Paris to make commercial... Read all

sinopsis: As Scott Lang balances being both a superhero and a father, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym present an urgent new mission that finds the Ant-Man fighting alongside The Wasp to uncover secrets from their past.

title: Dogman (2018)
sinopsis: A timid dog groomer living in a poor suburb sells cocaine on the side and stays out of trouble, while trying to deal with his unstable, violent acquaintance who is a menace to the whole neighborhood.

title: Mamma Mia: Here We Go Again! (2018)
sinopsis: Five years after the events of Mamma Mia! (2008), Sophie prepares for the grand reopening of the Hotel Bella Donna as she learns more about her mother's past.

title: Tag (2018)
sinopsis: A small group of former classmates organize an elaborate, annual game of tag that requires some to travel all over the country.

title: The Man Who Killed Don Quixote (2018)
sinopsis: Toby, a disillusioned film director, is pulled into a world of time-jumping fantasy when a Spanish cobbler believes himself to be Sancho Panza. He gradually becomes unable to tell dreams from reality.

title: Boundaries (2018)
sinopsis: Laura and her son Henry are forced to drive her estranged, pot-dealing, carefree father Jack cross country after being kicked out of a nursing home.

title: Spiral (2018)
sinopsis: A look at the rise of anti-Semitism and assaults against Jews in present-day France.

title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout (2018)
sinopsis: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.

title: SuperFly (2018)
sinopsis: With retirement on his mind, a successful Atlanta-based drug dealer sets up one last big job while dealing with trigger-happy colleagues and the police.

title: Iron Soldier (2010)
sinopsis: A robot created by the military falls into the hands of a group of mercenaries. It's up to the son of the man who created the robot to stop the mercenaries before they sell the robot to a foreign power.

title: BlacKkKlansman (2018)
sinopsis: Ron Stallworth, an African American police officer from Colorado Springs, CO, successfully manages to infiltrate the local Ku Klux Klan branch with the help of a Jewish surrogate who eventually becomes its leader. Based on actual events.

title: The Darkest Minds (2018)
sinopsis: Imprisoned by an adult world that now fears everyone under 18, a group of teens form a resistance group to fight back and reclaim control of their future.

title: Tilt (2011)
sinopsis: TILT is a love story set against the backdrop of the changing political and social environment in Europe in the late 1980s and early '90s. Can this love survive the challenges of emigration, a violent homeland and immoral social atmosphere thanks to a gang of adventurous friends?

title: Jeff Ross Roasts the Border (2017)
sinopsis: Roastmaster Jeff Ross explores the world surrounding the U.S.-Mexico border, speaking to immigrants, DREAMers, detainees, border patrolers, human traffickers and Trump supporters. Then he puts on a show next to the border wall to roast American immigration policies, random audience volunteers and every ethnicity imaginable.

title: John From (2015)
sinopsis: Bored by spending the summer in the city, 15-year-old Rita decides to take a fancy to her new neighbor, a photographer who is setting up an exhibit of his shots in Melanesia. What starts as a game turns into a blazing crush and Rita can't distinguish between reality and fantasy anymore.

title: Liquid Truth (2017)
sinopsis: A boy's parents accuse a swimming teacher of abusing one of his students.

title: Bunny (1998)
sinopsis: An elderly widowed rabbit grieving her husband's death is encountered by a moth who invites her into the afterlife.

title: Hommage à Zgougou (et salut à Sabine Mamou) (2002)
sinopsis: A short tribute to Zgougou, Agnès Varda's cat.

title: Gintama (2017)
sinopsis: In an era where aliens have invaded and conquered feudal Tokyo, a young samurai seeks work as he can.

title: Gintama: The Movie (2010)
sinopsis: The silver-haired samurai Sakata Gintoki investigates the disappearance of a legendary sword named Benizakura while his partners Kagura and Shimura Shinpachi try to find out what has happened to Gintoki's friend, Kotaro Katsura.

title: anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day - The Movie (2013)
sinopsis: A group of friends were separated when one of them died in an accident. Later on she comes back as a ghost trying to get into heaven but to do that her friends must grant her a wish.

title: Silver Spoon (2014)
sinopsis: Yuugo, who grew up in the city, finds himself in an unfamiliar environment at Ooejo Agricultural High School, surrounded by nature and animals. Yuugo is also the only one who doesn't know what type of career he wants to pursue. He goes through struggles everyday, but he begins to grow as a person.

title: Love Live! The School Idol Movie (2015)
sinopsis: The story of the film begins after the events of the second season, at the graduation ceremony of the third-year students. title: Jon Stewart Has Left the Building (2015)
sinopsis: A special look at Jon Stewart's career hosting The Daily Show that offers a look from the perspective of numerous special guests and presents highlights of his 16 years presenting political news.

title: Black Butler: Book of the Atlantic (2017)
sinopsis: A young lord and his demon butler board a luxury cruise ship to investigate claims of the dead being returned to life, and are faced with various complications.

title: No Game No Life: Zero (2017)
sinopsis: Adaption of the sixth Light Novel of series, it follows the story of two new characters - Riku and Schwi - during the events of the Great War, prior to the Ten Covenants.

title: Flint (2017)
sinopsis: A woman deals with the toxic water scandal in Flint, Michigan, and the effect it has on her family.

title: Bungo Stray Dogs: Dead Apple (2018)
sinopsis: The Armed Detective Agency investigates a bizarre series of suicides involving an eerie mist.

title: Andrew Dice Clay: Dice Rules (1991)
sinopsis: Outrageous, misogynistic and vulgar-to-the-max comedian Andrew Dice Clay does his stuff in this combination of a stand-up concert video, in a filled-to-capacity performance at Madison Square Gardens, and a series of comedy sketches.
